Package Documentation

Overview of the WPD package

WPD WPD-package
WPD: World Panel Data Visualization and Analysis Toolkit

Data Management

Core functions for data loading and manipulation

wp_data()
Load and Process World Panel Data
wp_info()
Display Information About Available Data Variables

Plotting Functions

Main plotting functions

wp_plot_bar()
Create Bar Plots with Statistical Indicators
wp_plot_scatter()
Create Scatter Plots with Advanced Visualization Options
wp_plot_series()
Create Time Series Plots with Multiple Configuration Options

ISO Code Utilities

Country ISO3 code handling functions

wp_ctry2iso()
Convert Country Name to ISO3 Code
wp_from_iso()
Convert ISO Code to Country Information
wp_get_category()
Get Countries Belonging to Specified Categories

Internal Functions

Internal helper functions
